title: simplehuman wide-view sensor mirror
description: Meet the wide-view sensor mirror — our most sophisticated sensor mirror yet. It helps you see yourself in the best light with our tru-lux light system, which simulates natural sunlight for the brightest, most color-correct view. It's also app-enabled to capture light settings from the world around you and accurately recreate them in the mirror.

asset.title: simplehuman wide-view sensor mirror
asset.description:
Meet the wide-view sensor mirror — our most sophisticated sensor mirror yet. It helps you see yourself in the best light with our tru-lux light system, which simulates natural sunlight for the brightest, most color-correct view. It's also app-enabled to capture light settings from the world around you and accurately recreate them in the mirror. 

Learn about all its features here: http://bit.ly/1QxmYKB
